<thor>.name: Thor
<thor>.info: Thor is the Norse God of Thunder, wielding the enchanted hammer Mj√∂lnir, which grants him control over lightning and the ability to fly. As the prince of Asgard, he brings cosmic power and divine strength to the Avengers.

<captain america>.name: Captain America
<captain america>.info: Enhanced to peak human potential by a super-soldier serum, Captain America is a symbol of justice, courage, and leadership. Armed with an indestructible shield, he leads the Avengers with moral clarity and battlefield expertise.

<hawkeye>.name: Hawkeye
<hawkeye>.info: A master archer with extraordinary aim and combat skills, Hawkeye is a former S.H.I.E.L.D. agent who supports the team with strategic precision. Though human, his loyalty and resourcefulness make him a dependable Avenger.

<scarlet witch>.name: Scarlet Witch
<scarlet witch>.info: Gifted with chaos magic and telekinesis, Scarlet Witch can manipulate reality and minds with incredible power. Initially a foe, she becomes one of the most powerful and emotionally complex Avengers.
